body:
*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*

Creating a view often fails because of common "junk" files (like README or LICENSE). Maybe view creation command could ignore such files?

*Describe the solution you'd like and the alternatives you have considered.*

(Configurable) list of file names that should not be linked into view.
title: Ignore common files (e.g. README or LICENSE) when creating a view
